title: Review Geotechnical Report
description: A civil engineer needs to review the geotechnical report for a site to determine the required foundation design for a new building.

tasks.description: Retrieve the geotechnical report for the project site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls up the soil investigation report.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to find the soil bearing capacity and recommendations for foundation type.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer finds the report recommends deep pile foundations due to poor soil conditions.

tasks.description: Update the project's design basis document to specify the use of pile foundations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the design basis to reflect the geotechnical requirements.
